title: 95/126/EC: Commission Decision of 6 April 1995 concerning the evaluation of 71 proposed measures which qualify for Community financing pursuant to Council Decision 94/445/EC on inter-administration telematic networks for statistics relating to the trading of goods between Member States (Edicom)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 6 April 1995 concerning the evaluation of 71  proposed measures which qualify for Community financing pursuant to Council Decision 94/445/EC on  inter-administration telematic networks for statistics relating to the trading of goods between  Member States (Edicom) (95/126/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The 71 proposals listed in Annex I may receive Community financing up  to the amounts stated in that annex.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 April 1995.
For the Commission Yves-Thibault DE SILGUY Member of the Commission
ANNEX
>TABLE>
